ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Power law with pegged normalization. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A power law with pegged normalization.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: K; flux (in units of 10^-12 erg/cm^2/s) over the energy range (eMin-eMax); if eMin = eMax, it is the flux (in micro-Jy) at eMin

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.
